title: Index of Employment, Hardware for United States
notes:
Source: Bureau Of Labor Statistics, For 1919-1930 Data: Bulletin No. 610, Pp. 100, 30-31; For 1931-1934 Data: Mimeographed Release Of September 1938, Revised Index Numbers Of Factory Employment And Payrolls; For 1935-1939: Mimeographed Release Of May 1940; For 1940-1942:"Employment And Payrolls" And Monthly Labor Review.

This NBER data series m08106 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.
